description:
Knowing Arashi`s secret and power, Hajime swears to keep it a secret, even though Arashi still doesn`t believe that she`s a ghost.
One day, Hajime and crew, decided to take some photos of this black-haired girl to be the lead in an independent movie with the help of some other students.
Hajime and Jun go along with Arashi to a photo shop, and after examining an old wartime photo they discover its a photo of Arashi, Kaya and another blond haired girl in the photo...
Source: crunchyroll
